text: USS Mira has been the name of two proposed United States Navy ships: * , a motor launch scheduled for World War I use as a patrol boat in 1918, but never commissioned * , a cargo ship acquired 6 November 1943 but transferred without being commissioned to the United States Army the next day, where she served as the U.S. Army Engineer Port Repair Ship Robert M. Emery Category:United States Navy ship names
title: USS Mira
